TunableList.name: ADVERTISING_COMMODITY_MAP
TunableList.description: The mapping between advertising enum and the advertising data for that type.

Tunable.name: advertising_commodity
Tunable.description: The commodity that will be added to the lot when this advertising type is chosen. This commodity is applied via the Advertising Interaction. This makes it easier for design to tune differences in how each business handles advertising. i.e. Retail allows advertising on multiple channels at the same time while restaurants only allow one advertisement at a time.
